# Infographics

- Static, suitable for print or static web page
- Self-contained story/narrative with a title, charts, & concise descriptive texts
- Design
  - Catching title
  - Thinking through what story/ies to tell of the data, 
  - Drill in with one or a few charts/maps/tables & leave out unnecessary information
  - Concise texts adding details (background, explanation,) to your story, but should not be required to grasp the story
  - Consider the overall layout
  - Use photos/icons in the infographics (sparingly)

# dashboard

- Interactive & live, allowing users/viewers/visitors to interact with & (ideally) get up-to-date information
- Good practices for infographics still apply to dashboards
